priorVersion.title: CDISC Protocol Expanded Access Study Type Value Set Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C187683

self.title: CDISC Protocol Expanded Access Study Type Value Set Terminology

definition: The terminology relevant to the type of expanded access study.
name: Expanded Access Study Type Value Set Terminology
preferredTerm: CDISC Protocol Expanded Access Study Type Value Set Terminology
submissionValue: Expanded Access Study Type Value Set Terminology
synonyms: Expanded Access Study Type Value Set Terminology

terms.definition: Expanded access to an investigational medical product (drug, biologic, or medical device) for treatment use in subjects after the controlled clinical trial has been completed and while the marketing application is being prepared by the sponsor or reviewed by the regulator.

Expanded access to an investigational medical product (drug, biologic, or medical device) for treatment use by a single patient submitted under a new Investigational New Drug (IND) application. (FDA: Expanded Access to Investigational Drugs for Treatment Use - Questions and Answers Guidance for Industry, June 2016)

Expanded access to an investigational medical product (drug, biologic, or medical device) for treatment use by a large (widespread) population, submitted under a new Investigational New Drug (IND) application. (FDA: Expanded Access to Investigational Drugs for Treatment Use - Questions and Answers Guidance for Industry, June 2016)
